title: Geography, Maps, and Compass Directions

vocab.definition: The study of Earth's features, places, and how people use the land
A symbol on maps that shows the four main directions
An important or easily recognized feature of a place
Shows how distances on a map relate to real distances
Lines that run east-west and measure distance from the equator
Lines that run north-south and measure distance from the Prime Meridian

teachingNotes: Use actual maps and compasses. Practice reading school and neighborhood maps. Create simple maps of classroom or playground.
